definition: The term "waschbar" refers to an object or material that possesses a specific quality related to cleanliness and maintenance. It is commonly used to describe items that can be subjected to a particular process without being damaged or losing their integrity.

examples.german: Die waschbaren Stofftiere können in der Waschmaschine gereinigt werden.
examples.english: The washable stuffed animals can be cleaned in the washing machine.
The washable diapers are environmentally friendly.

examples.german: Die waschbaren Handschuhe können wiederverwendet werden.
examples.english: The washable gloves can be reused.
